settings.heading: Contact Homecraft
settings.subheading: Our support staff are here to answer any of your questions. You can reach us at our two stores, or by email.
settings.map_info_store:
Our store location

settings.title: Subscribe & Save
settings.sectionHeading_text_2: Stay up to date on all of our latest arrivals, sales and exclusive coupons!

settings.text_1:
Sew easier with over
10,000 products in our collection!
settings.text_2:
Family owned and operated, we’ve been specialising in dress fabrics, haberdashery,
curtaining and home furnishings since 1999.

We’re one of Australia’s largest independent stockists with stock arriving from all corners of the globe.

A true fabric emporium, we model our two showroom stores that reminisce an Oriental Bazaar.

Nicknamed Aladdin’s Cave, we’re proud to house a treasure trove of fabrics across our two stores in Perth and our online store.
settings.title: Sew Easier

settings.text_2:
We wholesale direct to the public.
Minimum purchase is 25M.
Send us a message with what you’re after and we’ll endeavour to source it for you.

settings.text_1:
You’ll find everything
you need for your
sewing & quilting adventures.
settings.text_2:
Everything from a full custom curtain making and upholstering
experience right down to the last thread & needle you’ll ever need.
settings.title: Banner full

settings.text_1:
Both of our 2000sqm showrooms
stock more products than our website.
settings.text_2:
If you can’t find what you’re looking for, we’ll find it for you.

We’re that rare fabric store that thrives in the quality of products, with that sublime harmony of stock quantity.

Come on down, or if you’re out of Perth, shop online and we’ll deliver it straight to your door!

settings.text_3: Launched in 1999, our 2000sqm store stocks well over 10,000 products.
Opened in 2019, our latest store stocks even more products.

settings.text_2:
Best of all, if you do order online, we have a flat rate on shipping and if your order exceeds $300*, shipping is free!

Stuck on anything?

settings.main_text_2:
Explore our range of fabrics from around the world.

For the past 20 years, we have been the leading Australian fabric wholesaler, bringing unique and rare, exotic, and classic fabrics to local designers and creative makers.

We are passionate about creativity and empower local makers to make their own clothing, handmade home craft and quilt making. We know that sewing is a passion for many of you and that is why we put so much effort in sourcing innovative, unique prints and natural fabric designs to help you come up with new trendy home crafts.

From the best quilting supplies to this season’s most sort after trendy prints, we have you covered with our large range of fabric and sewing supplies. Explore our categories below and reach out if you need any sewing tips or fabric advice. Our friendly team of fabric experts will be more than happy to assist you with your new craft project. We specialise in:
  • Quilting fabric and supplies
  • Luxury fabrics such as satin, silk and embroidery
  • Designer prints and fabric range
  • Natural cotton and linen
  • High quality wool
  • Novelty fabrics
  • Theatre and dance wear
settings.title: Australia’s Largest Supplier of Fabric
Can’t find what you’re after?
settings.content: Send us a message with what you’re after and we’ll endeavour to source it for you. Contact us here.

settings.title: Nationwide delivery
settings.content:
$14.99 Flat Rate Shipping
Free Shipping Over $300
Read our shipping policy.

settings.title: Wholesale & bulk orders
settings.content:
We wholesale direct to the public.
Minimum purchase is 25M.
Enquire here for wholesale pricing.

settings.title: DIRECT MANUFACTURE
settings.content: As a direct manufacturer of almost all of our fabrics, Fabric Wholesale Direct is able to control all aspects of our production. This means better quality control, consistent dye lots, re-orderability and a large inventory

settings.title: WHOLESALE PRICES, NO MINIMUMS
settings.content: FWD provides extremely competitive pricing on its fabrics while also catering to customers of all sizes. Whether you're looking to purchase fabric for a production run or simply looking for a few yards, we handle orders of all sizes.

settings.title: ON-SITE CUSTOMER SERVICE
settings.content: We stand by all of our fabrics because, after all, we manufacture it! Our highly-trained customer service team is on-site at our discount fabric warehouse facility to provide you with the best help. Our No-Questions-Asked Return Policy is just a testament to how confident we are in our fabrics.

settings.title: Changing The Way You Order Fabric
settings.sectionHeading_text_1: Changing The Way You Order Fabric
